aboutFaqClosing.description: Everything you need to know about us and our service

logosCarousel.text: More than 70 real estate agencies trust us

description.part1: Since 2021 we help real estate agencies to capture property owners interested in selling. We have perfected our system in Spain.
description.part2: We know the sector and understand how much it costs to get a contract. That's why we accompany you throughout the process.

question1.question: Is there a commitment?
question1.answer: No, we work month by month. You can cancel whenever you want without penalties.

question2.question: What type of leads do I receive?
question2.answer: Property owners with real intention to sell, filtered through our predictive AI system.

question3.question: When do I start receiving contacts?
question3.answer: In less than 7 days after defining your area and setting up personalized campaigns.

question4.question: What areas are available?
question4.answer: We work in the main cities of Spain and Portugal with limited availability.

question5.question: Does it include support and guidance?
question5.answer: Yes, it includes professional contact script, exclusive WhatsApp group and personalized monthly review.

description.part2: we show you how we work and if

finalCta.title: Do you have more questions?
finalCta.description: Let's talk and we'll tell you everything you need to know

hero.title: You are now part of the system
hero.subtitle: Get ready to get quality leads in your area

intro.text1: If you have reached this point, it is because you are already part of the system. You were probably looking for an effective way to get contacts from property owners who:
intro.text2: If that's what you were looking for, you've made a great decision. And you won't be alone: we are a professional, transparent team and we will be with you throughout the month to help you meet your lead generation goals.

step1.title: Before we start, there are two key questions:

question1.title: How do we get leads?
question1.text1: We use targeted campaigns on Meta (Facebook + Instagram) and Google Ads to reach people who are considering selling their home. We create ads that generate real interest and take them to forms where we ask for key data: area, type of property, reason for sale...
question1.text2: This step allows us to rule out the curious and focus on owners who are willing to talk. It's not a perfect system —like any online lead generation, some unwanted leads can slip through— but it's not common.
question1.tip: Furthermore, before launching your campaign, we share a description of the type of ad we will use, so you know what the owner has seen when they call you or you call them. This will help you guide the conversation and not go in blind.

question2.title: What results can you expect?
question2.text1: We guarantee up to 40 exclusive leads per month. On average, 1 out of 9 leads converts to acquisition. Success depends largely on how the first contact is managed, which is why we give you:

benefits.benefit1: A guidance script for calls (adaptable to your style)
benefits.benefit2: Access to our team for questions about how to contact each lead
benefits.benefit3: Bi-weekly follow-up to fine-tune the campaign based on results

question2.text2: Keep in mind that some acquisitions are not closed immediately. There are owners who need to resolve inheritances, documentation or simply time to decide. That's why many times what you work on in month 1 brings you results in month 2 or 3.

timeline.title: When do you start seeing leads?
timeline.text: Normally within 24-48h from campaign launch they start coming in. In some cases it may take a little longer (up to 4-5 days), but it's infrequent. The important thing: the monthly volume is always met.

summary.title: In summary:
summary.text: This is a system that works if you make it work too. We get you the contacts, give you the context and accompany you. You call them, work them, and with consistency, the acquisitions come.

step2.title: Schedule meeting via Calendly for onboarding

cta.title: Last step to get started!
cta.description: Schedule your onboarding meeting to set up your campaign and start receiving leads in 24-48h.
